view_prod_store_sum.store AS totalStore,
product.designer_id AS designer_id, product.color_code AS color_code FROM product LEFT JOIN shop_product ON shop_product.shop_id = 65 AND shop_product.enabled = TRUE AND shop_product.product_id = product.product_id INNER JOIN vendor ON product.vendor_id = vendor.vendor_id AND product.enabled = TRUE INNER JOIN brand ON brand.brand_id = product.brand_id AND brand.enabled = TRUE
LEFT JOIN view_prod_store_sum ON view_prod_store_sum.product_id = product.product_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id, sku_id, max(status) AS status FROM product_exception GROUP BY product_id) exception ON product.product_id = exception.product_id

AND product.status IN (4,2)
AND product.status = #{status}
AND shop_product.status IS NULL
AND shop_product.status = #{shopStatus}
AND view_prod_store_sum.store > 0
AND view_prod_store_sum.store <= 0
AND brand.brand_id = #{brandId}
AND product.category_id IN
#{item}
AND product.season_code = #{season}
AND product.product_code LIKE "%"#{boutiqueId}"%"
AND vendor.vendor_id IN
#{item}
AND (length(product.cover_img) >= 5 AND length(product.description_img ) >= 5)
AND (length(product.cover_img) < 5 OR length(product.cover_img) < 5 )

INNER JOIN vendor ON product.vendor_id = vendor.vendor_id AND vendor.enabled = TRUE
LEFT JOIN view_prod_store_sum ON view_prod_store_sum.product_id = product.product_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id, sku_id, max(status) AS status FROM product_exception GROUP BY product_id) exception ON product.product_id = exception.product_id
WHERE product.enabled = TRUE
AND view_prod_store_sum.store > 0
AND view_prod_store_sum.store <= 0
AND brand.brand_id = #{brandId}
AND product.category_id IN
#{item}
AND product.season_code = #{season}
AND product.product_code LIKE "%"#{boutiqueId}"%"
AND vendor.vendor_id IN
#{item}
AND (length(product.cover_img) >= 5 AND length(product.description_img ) >= 5)
AND (length(product.cover_img)< 5 OR length(product.cover_img) < 5 )
AND product.img_modified = 1
AND product.img_modified = 0
AND product.designer_id LIKE "%"#{designerId}"%"
